articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Germany vs Denmark in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Germany vs Denmark LIVE: Euro 2024 football score, commentary, line-ups & updates

articles.description: Italy are described as "shambolic" and the "worst in a lifetime" after exiting to Switzerland, but Luciano Spalletti remains unfazed.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Italy criticised and Luciano Spalletti's future questioned after last-16 defeat by Switzerland

articles.description: In a tournament billed as cricket's attempt to break into the US, India's dramatic win provides a Hollywood ending, writes Matthew Henry.
articles.title: T20 World Cup final: India's thrilling win gives tournament its Hollywood ending

articles.description: Britain’s Mark Cavendish struggles on stage one of the Tour de France, and is set to finish more than 30 minutes behind the peloton.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024: Mark Cavendish struggles as Romain Bardet wins stage one

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen put in an imperious performance to take pole position for the Austrian Grand Prix from McLaren’s Lando Norris.
articles.title: Max Verstappen on Austria pole ahead of Norris and Russell

articles.description: Rising sprint star Louie Hinchliffe will make his Olympic debut at Paris 2024 after winning the British 100m title at the UK Athletics Championships in Manchester.
articles.title: UK Athletics Championships 2024: Louie Hinchliffe wins 100m title to secure Olympic debut

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from England vs Slovakia in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: England vs Slovakia: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: India legends Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma retire from T20 internationals following their World Cup triumph in Barbados.
articles.title: Virat Kohli & Rohit Sharma retire from T20 internationals after World Cup win

articles.description: Daria Kasatkina sees off a spirited effort from Leylah Fernandez to win the Eastbourne International in straight sets.
articles.title: Eastbourne International: Daria Kasatkina beats Leylah Fernandez 6-3 6-4 to win seventh WTA title

articles.description: Andy Murray practises as he tries to make a Wimbledon farewell, while Novak Djokovic and Aryna Sabalenka provide fitness updates.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024: Andy Murray and Novak Djokovic practise, Aryna Sabalenka not 100% fit
